root.name: Gaelic Games: Football
root.description: Gaelic Games: Football was the first Gaelic football video game released. It was released on November 11, 2005 only in Ireland. It was developed by IR Gurus (Transmission Games) and was published by Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. It was fully licensed by the GAA but not the GPA.FeaturesAll 32 County Team (including London New York) in their latest jersies.Full Match Player Statistics.Includes Croke Park and various County grounds.Live commentary from Micha√©l o' Muircheartaigh.League, Provincial and All-Ireland ChampionshipReal time lighting and shadows on playersGaelic and English languagesMotion Capture animations.
